attributes.action: Keep the Royal British Legion open in Crewe
attributes.background: I am a serving member of the Royal Navy and part of the British legion and have worked along side the veterans for years to get the museum to where it is today.

rejection.details:
Decisions about branches of the Royal British Legion are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. 

You can contact the Royal British Legion here:

http://www.britishlegion.org.uk/about-us/contact-us
